title: Journey to Juniper Junction
description: If you love fun-filled, lighthearted adventures you'll love the My Country Cousins series!Ten-year-old Gemma Merriman longs for adventure. Leaving her home in England to spend the holidays with her Canadian cousins, she hopes she'll have the best summer ever. But will she? Right from the start Gemma faces challenges she never imagined.Join Gemma as she explores her newfound independence in Journey to Juniper Junction. This story, the first in the My Country Cousins series, is a fun, fast-paced read. Glowing with warmth and humour, it celebrates the joys of growing up.
author: Heather N. Quinn
